casebody.data:
ORANGE CITY SCHOOLS BD. OF EDN.
v.
CUYAHOGA CTY. BD. OF REVISION 2019-0425 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 12, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

Cause held for the decision in 2018-1299, Columbus City Schools Bd. of Edn. v. Franklin Cty. Bd. of Revision. Kennedy, J., concurs in accepting the appeal but would not hold the cause for the decision in 2018-1299, Columbus City Schools Bd. of Edn. v. Franklin Cty. Bd. of Revision. Donnelly and Stewart, JJ., dissent.

APPEAL ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW
